alert.note: Alert for Clay; Coles; Cumberland; Douglas; Effingham; Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:50PM CDT until March 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR COLES...SOUTHEASTERN MOULTRIE...SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...WESTERN CUMBERLAND...NORTHWESTERN CLAY...CENTRAL EFFINGHAM AND SOUTHERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 850 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Arcola to near Edgewood, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Edgewood around 855 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hindsboro, Oakland and Rardin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 142 and 210. Interstate 70 between mile markers 82 and 102. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central, central and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Coles; Cumberland; Douglas; Effingham; Moultrie; Shelby
